titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Daniel Brown Papers
titlestmt.author: Isabel Carleton

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by Isabel Carleton.

did.abstract: This collection contains work papers, mostly related to building the new Plant Sciences Building at the Cary Arboretum, from the 1970's.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to researchers by appointment only

bioghist.p: Daniel Brown was the Capital Projects Coordinator of the Cary Arboretum during the 1970's. He was also the Project Director for Solar Energy work at Cary.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains work papers, mostly related to building the new Plant Sciences Building at the Cary Arboretum, from the 1970's. There are lots of letters and building floor plans, many contractor bids, and a focus on renewable energy, like solar.

userestrict.p: The materials in this collection are protected by copyright.

scopecontent.p: " Letters about purchasing a walk-in cooler, insulation standards, budget discussions, planning out potential projects, permit fees, firing people, greenhouse alarm systems, etc

" Getting an architect to build the center, including possibly an underground building. Planning projects related to sustainable energy. Environmental considerations in new Cary building, like considering solar. Sewage system plans.
Discussion of budget concerns.
Discussion of managing temperature of buildings. History of cold room temp.
Info about science lectures at high schools, educational building tours, event attendance lists, office phone issues, volunteer orientation, other newsletters and memos.
Info about hunting and fishing rules/permits, and transmission lines. Also includes Cary property maps.
A bunch of little office correspondences.
Safety and inventory information.
Maintenance issues, discussions about living research collections and moving around trees.
Correspondences about electrical capacity and Dr Payne visiting the arboretum.
Departmental correspondences regarding development of student programs, energy costs, heating, telephones, repair work, operations department plan and budget, hiring, greenhouse alarm system.
List of content in the Cary library based on content, into about library tours, bibliographies, operations of library.
Info on grants and maternity leave.
Correspondences about money.
Also includes doodles of future projects.
Education building project plans, library and elevator plans.
More building plans and discussions of cabinets, locks, etc
Newsletters, bylaws, membership records, meeting schedules, discussions of making a northeastern NY chapeter
List of info and resources about greenhouses, preparing a technical aid searches document
Center for the Hudson River Valley forum invite, solar hot water program, solar grants information
